overview: Madan and Rupa are hired by the KTV News Channel to work together to unravel the mystery of Parvathipuram, a mysterious village where anybody who went there for the last five hundred years had been killed.Rupa dies and Madan is suspected to have killed her. Later with the help of Anna & Shruti learn about the history of Parvathipuram  and the reason for all of the mishaps in the village.
title: Oru Nodiyil
